sql-select.name: GetTablesWithForeignKeysNotTrusted
Foreign Keys Not Trusted
sql-select.description: Find all foreign keys which are not trusted
sql-select.sql-select-text:
SET NOCOUNT ON; SET DEADLOCK_PRIORITY LOW;
SELECT tSO.[type_desc] AS [ObjectType] ,tSS.[name] AS [SchemaName] ,tSO.[name] AS [ObjectName] ,tSO.[create_date] AS [ObjectCreateDate] ,tSFK.[type_desc] AS [ForeignKeyType] ,tSFK.[name] AS [ForeignKeyName] ,tSFK.[create_date] AS [ForeignKeyCreateDate] ,tSFK.[is_not_trusted] AS [ForeignKeyIsNotTrusted] ,tSFK.[is_not_for_replication] AS [ForeignKeyIsNotForReplication] ,tSFK.[is_disabled] AS [ForeignKeyIsDisabled] FROM [sys].[objects] tSO INNER JOIN [sys].[schemas] tSS ON tSS.[schema_id] = tSO.[schema_id] INNER JOIN [sys].[foreign_keys] tSFK ON tSFK.[parent_object_id] = tSO.[object_id] WHERE tSO.[type_desc] = N'USER_TABLE' AND OBJECTPROPERTY(tSO.[object_id], N'IsMSShipped') = 0 AND tSFK.[is_not_trusted] = 1 AND tSFK.[is_not_for_replication] = 0 AND tSFK.[is_disabled] = 0 ORDER BY tSS.[name] ,tSO.[name] ,tSO.[type_desc] ,tSO.[create_date] ,tSFK.[name] ;
